entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:06 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
